website_summaries.verdict: Classic and stylish, this versatile can is a great option for home office, professional, or workspace environments.
pros: Rolodex knows office supplies, and this classic office trash can is no exception
The wire frame is surprisingly durable, with the occasional small dent proving easy to pop out
A well-made, long-lasting product from a trusted brand
cons: The mesh design limits the kinds of trash that can be stored in the can, so this is not a good fit for kitchen-type environments

customer_reviews.title: Black Rolodex Mesh Round Wastebasket, 11-1/2 Diame
customer_reviews.text: Rolodex Mesh Round Wastebasket, 11-1/2 Diameter just delivered. Good size but not so sturdy. Arrived not well packaged and dented. I popped the mesh into place and although the dent is still apparent, it will be hidden under the computer desk. Surprised it's not sturdy like my other one. Older one in student's room is shorter and quite sturdy. It is NOT a 'Rolodex Wastebasket, and was purchased on Amazon about 2-3 years ago. I cannot recommend this new model. Amazon shippers were not careful this time.
customer_reviews.author: Cali Native

customer_reviews.title: I Almost Feel Bad Putting Trash in It
customer_reviews.text: I had the same "problem" as a previous reviewer of my wastebasket arriving a bit dented on the side. However, because of its incredibly sturdy, yet flexible, construction, I was able to simply pop out the dent with no adverse effects whatsoever, which shows just how reliable this product is. Its also the perfect size for an office or bedroom, as it is big enough to not require constant emptying, while small enough to be barely noticeable in the room. I would highly recommend this product at twice the price, but luckily I don't have to :) You really can't go wrong with this one.
customer_reviews.author: sal5046

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Nice size and is well made. Fits my costco bags perfect. I expect to get many years worth of use out of this Rubbish basket. All they had here were plastic for the same price and I had one of those that lasted only a year and half at best. I am the type of person that likes to buy things that will last and are functional. I do not care for products that are cheaply made to last for a short period of time so you can go out and buy another one. I guess I am a like my grandfather that way, buy it once.
customer_reviews.author: roger

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking and great quality
customer_reviews.text: I admit it, I bought this based solely on the brand name. One day I got to wondering what became of Rolodex, and found that they are still alive and well - at least in name - and you can still buy all their classic products. This waste basket is actually quite stunning. I bought it the same time I bought a new desk, and it is a perfect complement. I've had it for a couple of months but I still can't bring myself to put any waste in it because it looks so nice the way it is.
customer_reviews.author: RadishTheHut

customer_reviews.title: Excellent wastebasket esp for kitchen use; Strong & Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sturdy wastebasket, just the right size for 10 gallon trash bag we have. This replaced the plastic round plastic cheap wastebasket we previously had for several years which the bottom had cracked being plastic. We actually use this for the kitchen and holds up excellently for kitchen trash; food scraps, bottles, etc., This should last quite a bit for a long time esp being made of lightweight metal.
customer_reviews.author: Careful Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Did I luck out?
customer_reviews.text: My Rolodex 22351 came shipped in the same box with the two Beautyrest pillows I ordered. ZERO DINGS. Mint condition. Flawless even with the shipping gorillas shootin hoops with it. Nice large basket... Haven't filled it yet, it's halfway at the moment... 5 stars unless the grocery size bag falls off the edge because the wastebasket is too tall and gets protein bar wrapper chocolate on it or something. Nice lookin wastebasket in any event if it's just for bagless use and like only crumpled paper and office materials. It is just a tiny wee bit tall for a shopping bag to lay flat at the bottom. YMMV.
customer_reviews.author: R.U. Serious

customer_reviews.title: Stylish but only for paper waste
customer_reviews.text: It's a waste basket. Not too much to say right? PROS: I think it's stylish Lightweight Strong build CONS: Only for office/paper waste I didn't think ahead of time when buying this waste basket. I liked the look and I bought it for my home office. But then I realized the hard way that it's only good for paper trash. I dusted my office and emptied the dust into the basket. The dust just went out the sides of the basket because of the mesh design. My error of course. So if you're looking for a paper/solid waste basket, get it! If you'll be emptying dust into it, look for a solid basket.
customer_reviews.author: Devan

customer_reviews.title: Unusual purpose
customer_reviews.text: I'm using these to store onions in the root cellar. The air circulates and mice and bugs can't get past the mesh. I cut a piece of plywood to cover the top and these work just fine.
customer_reviews.author: ITCS

customer_reviews.title: Good trash can, way better than any plastic
customer_reviews.text: This is a great stylish trash can. I was tired of having plastic things everywhere in my apartment, and decided to try to replace as much plastic as possible with metal, glass, and ceramic. The plastic old trashcan was one of the first things to go and was replaced by this nice mesh metal trash can. It holds way more trash so I hardly have to empty it, and it isn't an eyesore in my apartment any more. I dented it once by dropping it but the mesh was easily reshaped back into place. Only downside is that sometimes small items get stuck in the mesh, but it is worth it for the look and feel. High quality
customer_reviews.author: Rogue

customer_reviews.title: It's a garbage can, what do you expect?
customer_reviews.text: It is a mesh, round wastebasket and the description was accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Phoenix

customer_reviews.title: The Most Convenient Purchase I've Made in a While
customer_reviews.text: This is hands-down one of the best items I've bought in a while as far as making my life more convenient goes. I use it purely for recyclables and it does the duty well. Durable, lightweight, arrived completely in tact with no dents, what more can you ask out of a bin?
customer_reviews.author: Vincent

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Below Average Shipping
customer_reviews.text: While it matches the other Rolodex desk products I've purchased, it came dented in several spots. While the walls of the wastebasket were easy to pop back into place, the base of the trashcan remains dented. Luckily it can be hidden by simply orienting the damage to the side facing the wall but it's still a bit of a frustration, especially when other reviews note the same shipping issues.
customer_reviews.author: Joe G.

customer_reviews.title: Wickedly well made for the price, presents well, but prone to tipping.
customer_reviews.text: Wickedly well made for the price and tough as nails. I would order 100 if I needed them. Color is as shown, dark black and it means business. Downside is that it is metal and somewhat weighty. If it gets hit without any weight inside, likely to tip over fairly easily. Very nice mesh design compliments overall look. Bottom has felt pads but I would recommend getting larger ones for hardwood offices.
customer_reviews.author: PAREVIEWER

customer_reviews.title: A wastebasket that isn't garbage
customer_reviews.text: Basic, old-fashioned-style mesh wastebasket. I bought this for my office. It works as you might expect - perfectly. Which is to say it holds my trash. If you have extremely discriminating tastes in wastebaskets, then perhaps this is not for you. Or at least, I am unable to report whether this is for you because I do not have such discriminating tastes. My office has sort of a retro mid-century look to it, and so this wastebasket fits right in. Great price, too. That's all I can really say.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan P. Long

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: It's honestly bigger than I thought it would be but that works out fine for me. I did have the same issue with a couple of people where the bottom is a little dented but you can't even tell. It's sturdy and looks really nice in my room.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Petersen

customer_reviews.title: 2nd one and arrived bent
customer_reviews.text: The first one was totally damaged ordered second one and it was still bent but kept it cause I needed it. Light weight but easily bendable
customer_reviews.author: mfrance74

customer_reviews.title: Makes a great DIY project
customer_reviews.text: This will be added to my already existing one, I invert one and hot glue the bottoms together other and then put a 13 inch pizza pan on top. I use it as a modern bow shaped side table that I can also use as storage when the tray is removed and you can put your phone, remote, etc. in the pan.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, but came lopsided
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd time ordering. This time, the wastebasket was lopsided like it got crushed a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Nali

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend to anyone looking for a descent trash can at a good price.
customer_reviews.text: Really nice....especially for the price. Was exactly what I was looking for to put in my boys room. Seems pretty sturdy and the openings are very small and tight so most things couldn't slip thru. Would recommend to anyone looking for a descent trash can at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: bballbm

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy but a good wastebasket for paper
customer_reviews.text: I cheap and average item; the mesh siding is a little flimsy. I would imagine it would bend if I tried to 'push' trash down into it. I use it for paper so it is fine but I would not buy this as a high usage waste basket. My purchase also came with a minor defect; it had a small dent on the bottom circle. I was too lazy and didn't care enough to return it but it does tell you that it cannot take a beating.
customer_reviews.author: Aleksandras W.

customer_reviews.title: It's a Trash Can!
customer_reviews.text: Sorry I cannot wax lyrical about a trash can. Do NOT put liquids in it. It is too big for grocery store plastic bag, too small for a kitchen trash can liner - I am going to have to investigate to see what size fits. I have to have liners in my trash cans! Good size in that it fits under the desk and holds a lot - but not large like a kitchen trash can. I have lots of trash! It is sturdy and can the abuse of being run over or used like a basketball hoop. I bet your house is not as exciting!
customer_reviews.author: C. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Rolodex mesh office supplies are awesome.
customer_reviews.text: I really like Rolodex's Mesh office products. They're simple, look decent and very cheap. I have several including the business card holder, pen cup and phone stand. All were a few bucks and look exactly the same as when I took the packaging off. I needed a wastebasket under my desk at home, so I immediately checked this one out. $10? I'll take it. Another solid product from Rolodex. Really, really pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Tabor

customer_reviews.title: BEST MESH ROUND "FILE" FOR THE BEDROOM!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this mesh type trash can to replace the 5 year old one that I had, which was slowly falling apart. It arrived in perfect condition with no dents, scratches or blemishes. The color is a medium bronze which probably goes with just about any decor. it looks great in my bedroom and you sure can't beat the price!
customer_reviews.author: DISABLED HARLEY RIDER

customer_reviews.title: Does the trick!
customer_reviews.text: I've honestly never been more satisfied with a trash can than this one. It's sturdy and not bendable and cheap. It holds up under hard labor and does what it was intended for. Absolutely love mine.
customer_reviews.author: Briana M.

customer_reviews.title: Like many others here
customer_reviews.text: Like many others here, mine was damaged in transit. I requested a replacement, which luckily came un-damaged. The basket is pretty flimsy--not strong or high-quality at all. However, it does look nice, and it does its job. Three stars for nice office aesthetic and functionality, no stars for overall quality. You should pretty much expect the thing is going to be damaged upon receipt, and be prepared to ask for a replacement. The seller I worked with was very gracious about getting a new one out.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Pretty trashcan
customer_reviews.text: Mine came fine, no dents or anything. It is the perfect size for bedrooms/bathrooms and never gets full. I like the look of it, but the one downside is the holes. One "morning sickness" episode caused me to throw up too far from a sink or toilet. I grabbed the trashcan, but unfortunately it doesn't hold puke. I put bags in all my trash cans now.
customer_reviews.author: BennettTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I'm much happier with this than I expected to be. Although I used a tape measure to try to approximate the size, it is a significantly larger in person than I thought, which is just fine. Also, I was a bit concerned by other reviews describing the material as flimsy. However, mine came undented and is as sturdy as I would expect a mesh wastebasket to be. Overall, this product is stylish, functional, and well worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Swinburne

customer_reviews.title: Great office basket
customer_reviews.text: It's bigger than I expected, but that's my own fault for not paying attention to the dimensions. Not necessarily a bad thing though, it's basically a standard size office basket. It's made of metal, so it looks and feels great. If you plan on throwing anything that's not dry in it, then you'll obviously need a bag since the walls are mesh, but imo that will ruin the look of it.
customer_reviews.author: Primeaholic

customer_reviews.title: Long term approved!!!
customer_reviews.text: We tossed out a can that literally cut our fingers when we would touch it from the rust and wires that came undone. Replaced it with this baby. I never thought I could love a trash can so much.
customer_reviews.author: Pepster

customer_reviews.title: I'll Keep It
customer_reviews.text: Rushed into this one (was a tad larger than I actually needed) but am not displeased. It is sturdy ..and actually lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: JohnFrancis

customer_reviews.title: Great Garbage Can!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this garbage can specifically to replace an old outdated one for my bedroom. I liked it because it is large enough to hold more garbage but not as big as a kitchen garbage. There is little to say about it as the garbage can is easily viewable from the pictures provided. It is designed well and will likely last a long time. In the event it needed to be clean, I see no reason that you would find difficulty doing so.
customer_reviews.author: Joe R

customer_reviews.title: Pretty straightforward, really
customer_reviews.text: I mean, it's a trashcan. I got exactly what I expected. This thing probably won't solve world hunger, but it'll totally hold my trash, and that's all I really need it to do.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse B. Schmitt

customer_reviews.title: Bottom is poorly attached to the wastebasket.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very attractive wastebasket. However, the sides are attached to the bottom by pressure fit, instead of welds or glue. Thus, putting a heavy object in the wastebasket and then picking up the wastebasket by its top rim or sides will cause the bottom of the wastebasket to fall off. While I was able to fix it by driving some screws to attach the sides to the bottom, I would not recommend the purchase of this wastebasket.
customer_reviews.author: JBK

customer_reviews.title: An Office Classic
customer_reviews.text: An office classic...looks as good as it works in either the home office or remote office when coupled with a shredder (I shred all paperwork with personal and/or business info and save the waste basket for junk mail and the countless return envelopes that serve little purpose since online bill pay.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Not great.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for about three years. I'm not impressed. It dents incredibly easily, and collects visible dust very quickly. Also, and this is my fault for not considering this prior to purchase...who wants to SEE trash? You can see all the trash in the bin. I've switched to something else and will donate this.
customer_reviews.author: H. White

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly durable!
customer_reviews.text: The mesh will dent, if the stock market upsets you and you lick the living snot out of it (and it won't hurt your foot, but the rings (top and bottom) are very strong. I've managed to undent the mesh easily, but it's hard to get it perfect again. I highly recommend it, as it's easy to move around with your foot if it's in the way, and it's very light. Just the right size to not be emptied constantly, but small enough to stay out of the way.
customer_reviews.author: Race

customer_reviews.title: Actually worth it because it's so light to carry.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I like Rolodex brand stuff, which I realize is kind of pointless, but that's why I chose this instead of a $2 walmart trash bin. I am leaving a review to say that this is very much worth it for a professional enviroment, where it won't be damaged, because of it's light weight design it can be used like a plastic bin as a dust catcher, or be moved easily, but it still has the feel of a quality metal bin. IF: you have kids or something around, this thing will dent fairly easily, and does not always pop back in to it's original form.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: A great place to put your trash
customer_reviews.text: When you think trash, think Rolodex. My trash just looks so classy in one of these baskets in my office. In fact, I had to order more. Why should my personal office trash look so great, and not the conference room, or the supply room? Now, I have trashy in these classy containers in every room in my office.
customer_reviews.author: Brian C.

customer_reviews.title: Budget friendly, but still worthy!
customer_reviews.text: Great cheap little trash can! The wiring can be a little weak, but I'm only using it for light trash, so I'm not worried.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah B

customer_reviews.title: Neat and Modern Feel
customer_reviews.text: What can I say? It's a $9 wastebasket! and it would probably run you about $30 in a store for something like this. A little bit bigger than I had pictured it being (which is not a bad thing) And it didn't come dented, although i'm sure many have come this way, I can't imagine it being very hard to fix, as the construction felt pretty sturdy. Overall I recommend this product 100% and it looks fantastic in my room.
customer_reviews.author: Derelict

customer_reviews.title: Good product at an affordable price
customer_reviews.text: Pleased with this waste basket. The holes in the metal meshing are small enough to prevent trash 'outflow,' but large enough to still confer a semi-transparent look. Item arrived completely intact with zero denting, and, to be frank, I think you'd have to deliver a decent blow to the metal paneling to make one in the first place
customer_reviews.author: sparrowhawkes

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Thank you, just protect it better when you wrap it because I received a little bit bent.
customer_reviews.author: susana

customer_reviews.title: QUALITY OFFICE LOOK TRASH COLLECTOR
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Higher quality than the ones at department stores. Nice size. Perfect for that office look next to my student desk in my bedroom. I personally put anything I want in it. It cleans easily enough. Nice weight. Feels like quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Reilly

customer_reviews.title: Rolodex 22351 Mesh round wastebasket, 11-1/2 diameter x 14-1/4h, black
customer_reviews.text: I got this wastebasket superfast from AMAZON.com. I have to say, it's the perfect size for any room in the house. the only bad thing I can say about it is that I wish I'd ordered (3) of them instead of one. LoL. The price is fantastic and it has the perfect height and size and is very well made too. Metal All Around! Highly Recommended. Will order more in the future! Thank You! (5 Star Rating).
customer_reviews.author: Brian C.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a black mesh trash can for my home-office. This is exactly what I wanted. It is sturdy, though it is unlikely that it would survive a good stomping. I wouldn't use it as something to stand on while painting the ceiling either, but it looks like it will last as long as I want it too with regular use. They sent the right color and it arrived in less than 48 hours (perhaps their warehouse is close to San Francisco?). Sweet!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Hageman

customer_reviews.title: I originally got this to make an air purifier look better; I wanted to put the ugly white thing ...
customer_reviews.text: As described. Just what I needed. It should be noted that the measurements around 14" are on the TOP ONLY; the bottom is quite a bit smaller. I originally got this to make an air purifier look better; I wanted to put the ugly white thing inside of this. But the bottom is not big enough; only the top. But it's still a really cute waste basket.
customer_reviews.author: Suzi Q

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and sturdy, holds a lot of stuff so I never ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this so I'd stop throwing wrappers and towels on the ground in my room because I was too lazy to get up and take it to the trash can in the kitchen. Light weight and sturdy, holds a lot of stuff so I never need to empty it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen K

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for beside the office desk.
customer_reviews.text: This is a well-made metal waste basket. It adds class to the office and holds quite a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Well made, has held up well, holds a good bit
customer_reviews.author: CR

customer_reviews.title: Not too small, Just generally awesome for a Waste Basket
customer_reviews.text: I mean, it's a waste basket. I got exactly what I paid for. It's durable (dog knocks it over, chews on the rim), easy to clean (I throw food trash in there sometimes, wasn't a big deal), not too small either. I have no complaints. Awesome waste basket.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Gunn

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Great durability. From college parties (sorry mom( to 4 moves, still going strong. Larger than average office garbage can
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for! It a little bigger than your normal office trash can but its still perfect! I can fit so much trash in the basket before I have to dump it out.
customer_reviews.author: MHerrera

customer_reviews.title: No complaints
customer_reviews.text: It's a wastepaper basket. Simple, sturdy, doesn't bend. Can't ask for more. I wish they made a smaller one so a plastic bag can easily fit though. The mouth at the top doesn't really fit a standard Shop Rite or Walmart bag ( a bit large), but I wouldn't take away a star just for that. I've bought two of them and will likely continue to do so in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Van

customer_reviews.title: good size
customer_reviews.text: Trash can is a good size larger then expected though perfect matches nicely with the rest of my desk set.
customer_reviews.author: snoopy

customer_reviews.title: They're Fine
customer_reviews.text: Even though I looked at the measurements, these are bigger than I expected. I bought 2 - one for my bathroom and one for my kitchen. Unfortunately, it doesn't fit under my sink so I'm not sure what to do with the kitchen one yet. I guess I now have one for my bathroom and one for my bedroom and will need another solution for the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: R. Uresti

customer_reviews.title: Good size, great look
customer_reviews.text: It fits under my desk int he open space next to my feet. It's about about as big as you can get without it being in the way and it has a really great look so even when you have some waste in there youre not too focused on the fact that it's a garbage can. Dont worry about the mesh sides being weak. I've had mine for a long time now and it still looks the same way it did when I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Brummettt

customer_reviews.title: Great trash can, not much else to say
customer_reviews.text: Does what it is supposed to do, it is a trash can. Very good price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than plastic containers
customer_reviews.text: Solidly built, metal, very classy and modern looking. Better than plastic containers. I bought two of these for my girls and they love them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I originally bought this item because I was unable to ...
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this item because I was unable to find a metal mesh trash bin anywhere else and once it came in I was actually surprised! It was nicer and larger than I thought. Overall if you need a trash bin for anywhere mainly I would imagine your office, this is the one you should go with!
customer_reviews.author: Jack Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Just what I expected
customer_reviews.text: What can you say about a trash can? It arrived promptly and just as described. We purchased this for our garage as my husband is a smoker and works there quite a bit on his laptop and dumps ashtrays in it so we didn't want a plastic trash can for fire safety reasons. It's very durable and is the perfect size....not too big and not to small. We're happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: I have been using old shopping bags for my garbage can in my office
customer_reviews.text: I have been using old shopping bags for my garbage can in my office. Yeah, I know...they work. However, I decided to get a real one and ordered this. It's a good style and fits well with my office decor. A kitchen garbage bag fits nicely in it.
customer_reviews.author: AZN8TV

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Trash Can!
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Just what i wanted! Arrived quickly and in perfect condition. It's a perfect size and I even love the color! Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Animal Advocate Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great size, modern looks
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new trashcan for my bedroom. This provides a clean look and has plenty of space. Side tip for is to use leftover bags from shopping as trash bags. There is no need to buy actual trash bags to fit this size trashcan.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Horne

customer_reviews.title: Extremely nice waste basket, 100% satisfied and postive review.
customer_reviews.text: a great, professional waste basket that looks and functions as needed at my workstation. Very nice quality, especially for the price. It's almost a shame that trash is thrown in it. lol. HIGHLY RECOMMEND TO ANY INTERESTED IN OFFICE WASTE BIN.
customer_reviews.author: DR BAFFICO

customer_reviews.title: Perfect trash
customer_reviews.text: The absolute perfect-sized wastebasket for the small office. I love it! It is also not too light and not too heavy. (In other words, you can throw an empty soda can into it from across the room and it won't move-even if you miss)! The opening is about a foot across, holding a lot of trash b4 you have to empty it.
customer_reviews.author: MKFS

customer_reviews.title: Does the job and looks nice in the den
customer_reviews.text: It is what it is and I got what I paid for. It came with a little bit of denting. And I can see that it is fairly easy to dent. But I'm not going to be using this item as a karate prop so I think it will work well for my needs. I recommend it as a wastebasket - LOL.
customer_reviews.author: Vince Neil

customer_reviews.title: Great Basket
customer_reviews.text: Great basket. Since it is a mesh, it allows the air to escape when putting the trash bag on so I don't have to worry about venting the bag.
customer_reviews.author: ANAS

customer_reviews.title: Good looking, good quality
customer_reviews.text: I like it so much I bought 3 more. One arrived dented but Amazon, as always, was quick to replace it. Here's what I like about it: 1. It looks good; 2. It's solidly built; 3. It's not plastic. I like the looks so much I'm thinking about replacing my coffee mug pen holder withto match.
customer_reviews.author: K. Haywood

customer_reviews.title: This isn't trash
customer_reviews.text: It's actually quite sturdy and my take away from the reviews on this product gave me the feeling that this would be somehow lacking in some category. However I would rank this as a high-quality product. I would never think of trashing it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lubliner

customer_reviews.title: It's a waste basket. I knocked off a star because it ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a waste basket. I knocked off a star because it came dented. I know I could return it and get a replacement, but I kind of just don't wanna bother because... it's just a waste basket. The box was not damaged so I have to imagine this happened at the warehouse.
customer_reviews.author: S. Tomlin

customer_reviews.title: perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: bought this to cover my angel chimes when the candles are lit. I have a parakeet that I allow to fly free and didn't want an accident to occur, so this gives me the peace of mind that she's safe from the candle flames.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy A. Stamp

customer_reviews.title: look no further because this trash basket is perfect. It does the job while looking simple/great
customer_reviews.text: Looking for a simple trash basket? Well, look no further because this trash basket is perfect. It does the job while looking simple/great. I bought the basket for my dorm in August and it has worked out great so far.
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sturdy wastebasket for my home office. This should last quite a long time as it is being made of lightweight metal. Totally recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Sury

customer_reviews.title: Great for trash
customer_reviews.text: This is a great trash can. I have it in my office. I throw trash in it. Then i empty it and repeat the cycle. Excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: It is perfect to gather the other trash to bring downstairs
customer_reviews.text: Wow this is a big trash can! I didn't think it would be so! It is perfect to gather the other trash to bring downstairs. I received new shoes and was able to throw the box in with room to spare. It matches the black accents of lamps and such, too. I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: It’s a trash can
customer_reviews.text: Is what I wanted for my office and was exactly what I expected it to be. It’s round and holds trash.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Great standard trash can, pay attention to the measurements, it is a bit larger than pictures make it appear.
customer_reviews.text: The standard black trash can you see at all the local stores. Only on Amazon, it is at a reasonable price. Pay attention to the measurements, it is a bit larger than I anticipated based the photo's with nothing for scale. But by no means is it too large.
customer_reviews.author: Family is over-rated

customer_reviews.title: The garbage can is as expected from description
customer_reviews.text: The garbage can is as expected from description. Pleasantly surprised we got just what we needed. Quality product. Strong and yet light to lift.
customer_reviews.author: Nora D.

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than I expected But it works...
customer_reviews.text: I gave 4 stars because I thought it was a small trash bin but it is actually bigger than I expected BUT overall it serves it purpose...
customer_reviews.author: Sophy

customer_reviews.title: Blends in well with the room
customer_reviews.text: Big enough for all the crumpled paper I have to throw when studying. Feels durable and actually looks nice. Obviously it's made of meshed wiring so throwing dust and liquids into it isn't a great idea unless you put a plastic bag inside the can. Got my money's worth.
customer_reviews.author: jinha

customer_reviews.title: It is what it is.
customer_reviews.text: It's a wastebasket. What else could you ask for. Good materials. You put trash in it.And looks nice enough. ' Not much more to it. Even came with a bunch of boxes to play with. Just get it.
customer_reviews.author: DAAT ONE GUY

customer_reviews.title: I love the design
customer_reviews.text: This beutiful waste basket has all the paper work throw away storage that I needed for my new home small office. I got a matching one for my pens that goes on my new composite black wood desk. I love the fact that it never gets mold. They seem to be in high demand as I am still awaiting shipment of mine in the USPS
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Great Wastebasket!
customer_reviews.text: This wastebasket is great. It's a perfect size for an office or bedroom. The black color is classy and it looks nice without standing out too much. We bought it over two years ago and it's still in great condition. The price is good too. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin B.Top Contributor: Activewear

customer_reviews.title: Nice cheap underdesk can
customer_reviews.text: Mine came with a tiny dent, but this kind of metal will eventually dent anyway if you stuff too much in at once. As long as it's just a bit of paper trash around an office, though, it'll be unmarred assuming it gets to you that way. Great for the cost.
customer_reviews.author: iskur

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. This bin has a weight that I associate with quality and it is very well made. Even after a year, there are no dents and the paint has not chipped at all. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Justin Fan

customer_reviews.title: Good As Garbage Can Be
customer_reviews.text: This wastebasket is huge and strong. Perfect for everyday use. Exactly how pictured.
customer_reviews.author: KelseyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Great basic trash can. Seems very well made and the sale price was incredible.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a great trash can
customer_reviews.text: Great quality trash can! I have a few of these I've bought over the years and they're great. They don't tip easily. Looks great and fits under most desks. The price was also excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Ian MazurskyTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly - sturdy and perfect for purpose. There isn't a thing I didn't like about them.
customer_reviews.author: Joni

customer_reviews.title: Attractive -- not large.
customer_reviews.text: I like the looks. The only thing I didn't think of was putting crumby things in it -- with the holes. I could but a liner in it, but that would ruin the look. I empty it several times weekly.
customer_reviews.author: John Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Rolodex 22351 Mesh round wastebasket, 11-1/2 diameter x 14-1/4h, black
customer_reviews.text: It does just what it is supposed to do and it looks good doing it. It was bigger than I thought it would be so I wasn't able to tuck it neatly under my desk, but that is okay because it is a good looking can so I've placed it on the side of my desk and though it is big, it looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Renee B

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size For Bathrooms or Bedrooms
customer_reviews.text: Great size and don't have to put a liner in it, like some other wastebaskets I have ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Granny73

customer_reviews.title: Fine basket/barrel/can
customer_reviews.text: A wastebasket. Or trash barrel. Or trash can. Or File 13. Or any other thing you call a receptacle for paper headed to the shredder, fireplace, or dump. It is a nice size.
customer_reviews.author: DoItYourselferTop Contributor: Jigsaw Puzzles

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Size, construction, ease of cleaning and price are what make this a 5 star product!
customer_reviews.author: PapaRon

customer_reviews.title: Decent little basket...
customer_reviews.text: This was the cheapest option out of the mesh office baskets I searched. Delivered exactly as pictured, no dents!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have not used a garbage bag in it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this wastebasket for my home office and mostly wanted it for paper trash and shredded paper. It works right for that. I have not used a garbage bag in it, but I don't even think it is designed for that. Cheap option for an office which has lots of paper trash.
customer_reviews.author: P. DeKraker

customer_reviews.title: A Professional Office Trash Bin
customer_reviews.text: It's a trash bin. Very functional, but doesn't hold walmart bags very well. A rubber band fixed that! The weld points on the top and bottom were very smooth and easily missed. No jagged edges to speak of. Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Cid

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: This black metal mesh garbage can is great. It looks good by my desk too. It is not cheap either it feels well made. This thing is also pretty big so it can hold lots of trash before you have to empty it again which is nice. I would recommend this to students or office workers.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas

customer_reviews.title: A very nice, sturdy
customer_reviews.text: A very nice, sturdy, functional item. Holds all sorts of paper without any leakage. Could probably also be used as a fencing mask. Anyway, a very useful addition to my office. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: R. Powers

customer_reviews.title: Love it, great price strongly made
customer_reviews.text: Exactly the size I was looking for. Love it, great price strongly made.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Spurgeon

product_meta.title: Rolodex Mesh Round Wastebasket, 11-1/2 Diameter x 14-1/4 H, Black (22351)
product_meta.description:
Package Quantity:1| Color:BlackWire mesh construction is durable and add good looks, efficiency and productivity to your workspace. Diameter: 11 3/8" Top; 9 1/4" bottom. Height: 14-1/4". Capacity: 18qt; 4.5gal

FROM THE MANUFACTURER


Rolodex Mesh collection includes everything from organizers, sorters, and letter trays to shelves, wall files, laptop stands, and more. view larger ROLODEX WORKSPACE ACCESSORIES
MESH LINE
Solid construction. Industrial look. Simple, practical functionality. This collection comes in black mesh reinforced with solid metal edging, and features unexpected details that make organization easier and faster.

TWO-TONE MESH LINE
Fine-gauge metal mesh panels in solid black come together with striking silver accents and contemporary curved lines to create the Rolodex Two-Tone Mesh line of workspace accessories. This collection is elegant in its simplicity, and thoughtfully created with details that help you stay organized.

BENEFITS & HIGHLIGHTS
Save Time and Stress 
Spend less time looking for what you need and more time focusing on what matters. Customize Your Workspace 
Rolodex offers over 30 different matching pieces to choose from so you can create the system that works best for you. Control the Chaos 
Whether it is piles of paper, miscellaneous office supplies, or your infamous junk drawer, Rolodex offers the tools you need to regain control of your workspace. Simple, Practical 
Easy-to-use tools that just work. Unexpected Details 
Sometimes it's the little things that can make all the difference. Rolodex workspace accessories are thoughtfully designed to make organizing faster and simpler. Trusted Quality Since 1954 
Rolodex workspace accessories feature sturdy metal mesh construction reinforced with solid metal edging. 
Note: images above may not reflect actual item. 

SIMPLE STEPS TO GETTING ORGANIZED
1. Stop and Think

 * What do you struggle with the most when it comes to being organized?
 * What could you do differently to help overcome this challenge?

2. Prioritize

 * Put the items you use most often closest to you.
 * Store less frequently used items in cabinets, drawers, or files.
 * If there is something you no longer need, just get rid of it.

3. Make the Most of Your Space with Rolodex Workspace Accessories

 * Whether you need help managing piles of paper, improving ergonomics, or organizing office supplies, the extensive collection of Rolodex workspace accessories can help keep your day-to-day from getting in the way so you can focus on what matters.

4. Designate a Place for Everything

 * Give everything a home so there is no question where to put items when not in use.
 * Use a letter tray or wall file as an inbox for papers that haven't been filed yet.
 * At the end of the day, take 5 minutes to file all of the papers in your inbox.

5. Evaluate Your System

 * No system is ever perfect the first time, so don't be afraid to make adjustments to your organizational system as you go.
 * The more effectively you can layout your system, the easier it will be to maintain.
feature_bullets: Add good looks, efficiency and productivity to your workspace
